name: DaveAnimaBasicsNotSpookySchool
description:
Oh no! Your mom put you in a really weird school and now for you to go out, you need to grab 7 notebooks and run away!

"NEW UPTADE"

different lighting

editing in animations

new game mode "davefarm"

increase in farm map

Dave new sprites (farm)

menu bug resolved

----------------------

inspired by baldi's basics and DaveNotSpookySchool(old game)

You control carl(Player) who is in a very strange school where his teacher doesn't like people who are bad at math, when he gets angry, the loud sound coming from the hallways starts.

how to play:

space to look back

wasd to walk

mouse to look around

right mouse button to use items

left click to pick up and interact with things

math is good
